attributes.action: Reject permanently all anti-Halal anti-Kosher anti-Religious Slaughter protest.
attributes.additional_details:
It's HIGH time we put to bed these anti-Muslim, anti-Islamic, anti-Religious Cultural practise sentiments once and for all. 
We need to embrace the established & recognised ethnic cultural practice of non-stun religious slaughter as absolutely normal throughout the UK.
Please help us set a tolerant, ethnically & culturally respectful example to our children & young by publically & legally protecting Religious Slaughter from discrimination, as was recently successfully petitioned for anyway!
attributes.background:
Racist groups & protesters using social media to campaign against Muslim & Islamic Cultures refuse to accept our Government's ruling in favour of Halal & Kosher Religious Slaughter in the UK. 

They even use racist tags #StopIslam #banislam #bantheburka #banhalal #bansharia to campaign against it!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
